lead_paragraph: RIDDER--Virginia Dunne, November 2, 1920 to June 4, 2016. All of Virginia's dear friends in New York City, Santa Barbara, London and Paris will miss her sparkle, warmth, grace and elegance. Born in NYC, the only daughter of Julia and John V. Dunne, one of the first members of the New York Stock Exchange, Virginia was formerly married to Joseph Ridder of California and Honolulu, who predeceased her. Virginia lived a busy life travelling around the world, fascinated by history, art, architecture, antiques and interesting places. She enjoyed her life in New York, a longtime member of the Colony Club, bridge, and a particular love of the Metropolitan Museum, Central Park and its Conservancy and many philanthropic institutions both in New York and Santa Barbara. She passed away peacefully and suddenly in Greenwich Hospital and her remains will be interred at the Dunne Mausoleum, Cemetery of the Gate of Heaven in Mt. Pleasant. At Virginia's request there will be no services. Interment is private. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RIDDER, VIRGINIA DUNNE
